Subbed Projects.Show Name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai Specials

Good Comments: Even if he used Google Translate he provides a video with subtitles which is better than nothing. Thank You!
Would've liked if some of the on-screen text was translated, but they were the only subs available so beggars can't be choosers.  All in all a good job though.
Bad Comments: It's the only English sub I could find, and it's quality is fine for the most part
